Articles.Content:
So i was trolling around on KSP and i came up with something completely ridiculous. It's a gigantic single engined plane with an overload of wings, and somehow it flew! I laughed quite badly at it...

And you guys have to admit it, we've all done this once in our history of ksp, and this is the thread to share those craft that make absolutely no sense, but still managed to work... somehow, but probably not in real life.

here's my piece of ridiculousness: the Flying Surface!

My most ridiculous craft would have to be...

Big rocket 2:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Over 4000 parts, and almost 40,000 tons of the launch pad.

Because of the extreme lag, it took 3 hours of real time to get this thing up to 26 Km and 1200 m/s. Too bad it exploded before I made orbit...

This is my current project.

The Goliath engine, during thrust testing it turned out you could literally just fly the engine to the mun, SSTM who needs a SSTO right?

And then there is the Titan mk1 (This is what the Goliath engine goes inside)

And yeah, It is interplanetary without refueling.

No point behind this thing at all really, just made it because i wanted to, been a side project of mine for a long time.
